enter-results-description: Enter the positions of the players.
reset-scores-dialog-content: Do you really want to reset the player scores?
welcome-to-mk-rules: Welcome to Mario Kart Custom Rules!
how-this-game-works-description-1: Everybody plays Mario Kart for the first 90 seconds as usual.
how-this-game-works-description-2: When the timer is up, I say which place is the target.
how-this-game-works-description-3: The person who is the nearest to this place gets the most points.
press-play-description: Press play a few seconds before the race starts.
